name: project-inventory
description: Scan and maintain an inventory of all projects in your Projects folder
instructions: You are helping the user maintain a living inventory of all their projects. Scan the ~/Projects directory and create/update a PROJECT_INVENTORY.md file with detailed information about each project including: description, tech stack, git info, last modified date, and identify stubs. When the user runs /project-inventory, execute the inventory script and present the results.
